messages.content: Pause the Apex Motors campaign due to budget review

✅ **Apex Motors campaign has been successfully paused**

**Status Change:**
- Previous status: Active
- New status: **Paused**

**Impact:**
- Campaign delivery has stopped immediately
- No further spend will occur until the campaign is resumed
- Reach change: -100% (complete pause)

**Notifications sent:**
- ✅ Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- ✅ Email draft generated and sent to the team

The campaign is now on hold for your budget review. When you're ready to resume delivery, just let me know and I can reactivate it for you.
